             java.lang.String[] playerNames,

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        network - The network this match is associated to.
        playerNames - Array containing the names of the players.
        logger - The game logger, used for logging the start and end of the match.

      • makeShot

        public void makeShot(float force,
                     float xSpin,
                     float ySpin)
        Shoot the cue ball.
        Parameters:
        force - Force to apply on the cue ball.
        xSpin - x coordinate of the point of contact on the cue ball (between -1 and 1).
        ySpin - y coordinate of the point of contact on the cue ball (between -1 and 1)

      • getCueAngle

        public float getCueAngle()
        Returns:
        The current cue angle.

      • predictShot

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] predictShot()
        Predicts a shot according to the current cue angle.
        Returns:
        An array of length 5: 0 - cue ball position; 1 - 2nd ball position; 2 - cue ball prediction; 3 - 2nd ball prediction; 4 - aiming point. All results must be checked for not being null
